text: 12 VERSION STORAGE Approach #1: Append-Only Storage — New versions are appended to the same table space. Approach #2: Time-Travel Storage —> Old versions are copied to separate table space. Approach #3: Delta Storage — The original values of the modified attrib | into a separate delta record space. | 4 p DJ @ 4734 /1:09:33 - Version Storage > - g ™ & $ I C \ E CMU Database Systems - 19 Multi-Version Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
